channel.title: CVE Feed for 2Way VideoCalls and Random Chat - HTML5 Webcam Videochat -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 2Way VideoCalls and Random Chat - HTML5 Webcam Videochat -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34656|2024-08-04T00:19:47.357Z -- 2way%20videocalls%20and%20random%20chat%20-%20html5%20webcam%20videochat -- 2way%20videocalls%20and%20random%20chat%20-%20html5%20webcam%20videochat
item.description: The 2Way VideoCalls and Random Chat - HTML5 Webcam Videochat WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the `vws_notice` function found in the ~/inc/requirements.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 5.2.7.
